long_description: Nimble and speedy, the Cannondale F29 Alloy 6 hardtail mountain bike boasts fast-rolling 29er wheels, a lightweight alloy frame and race-inspired geometry for big grins on the trail. F29 aluminum frame features a race-inspired geometry that offers nimble handling; 1.5 in. head tube improves strength, stiffness and handling. Rear stays are shaped to help smooth out trail chatter and enhance rolling speed, acceleration and handling. Magura TS6 fork offers 100mm of smooth travel with lockout. Large BB30 bottom bracket design increases stiffness for improved power-transfer. Shimano Deore shifters, Deore Shadow Plus rear derailleur and Deore front derailleur quickly guide the chain through the 20 gears of the 2x10 drivetrain. Shimano M505 hydraulic disc brakes provide great feel and progressive, powerful braking, thanks in part to the pairing of a 180mm rotor up front and a 160mm rotor in the back. Stans ZTR rims are wrapped with tubeless-ready Schwalbe Racing Ralph Performance tires provide fast-rolling performance on medium- to hard-packed trails. Pedals sold separately. Specs on the Cannondale F29 Alloy 6 hardtail mountain bike are subject to change.
short_description: Nimble and speedy, the Cannondale F29 Alloy 6 hardtail mountain bike boasts fast-rolling 29er wheels, a lightweight alloy frame and race-inspired geometry for big grins on the trail.
